headline: How a New Chief Digital Officer With AI Expertise at A. O. Smith (AOS) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: A. O. Smith Corporation recently appointed Chris Howe as senior vice president and chief digital information officer, bringing extensive experience in cloud transformation and generative AI to replace the outgoing CIO, Melissa Scheppele. This executive change signals the company's intent to accelerate digital transformation and embed advanced analytics and AI capabilities throughout its operations. Now, we'll consider how Howe's digital and AI expertise may shape A. O. Smith's investment...

headline: A. O. Smith: An Undervalued Stock For Your Dividend Growth Portfolio
summary: A. O. Smith, a manufacturer of a broad range of residential and commercial water heaters and boilers, is now a $10 billion (by market cap) water technology leader. Read more here.
